alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:40PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wood, northwestern Portage and southern Marathon Counties through 830 PM CDT... AAt 739 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Marshfield, or 22 miles southwest of Wausau. Additional thunderstorms were also occurring northeast of Wisconsin Rapids. The thunderstorms were moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mosinee around 805 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Milladore, Sherry, Rozellville, Big Eau Pleine County Park, Moon, Auburndale, Stratford, Hewitt, Blenker and Dancy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
